323811.「あはは！ 何度見ても\n あたし すっごい いい笑顔！\n <pc>に 撮って:
Ha-ha-ha! No matter how many times I see it, I
still have a really nice smile! Is it because
I had <pc> take this picture?

323812.「バーベキューも おいしかったな～。\n 鉄板で焼く お肉が ジューシーで！\n:
The barbecue was delicious! The meat grilled
on the grill was juicy! I ate a lot of it.

323813.「それでさ……お肉 おいしいから\n やっぱり ラキにも\n 食べてほしいなーっ:
And I thought...the meat is delicious, so I
wanted Raki to try it too.

323814.「おみやげに お肉ぎっしりサンドイッチを\n 買って 帰ったんだよね。\n えと:
I bought you a San Deutsch filled with meat as
a souvenir. Well...how was it? Raki.

323815.「……ポルテが しつこいから 食べたけど\n ラキには よく わからなかった。\:
...Porte was persistent, so I ate it, but Raki
couldn't really understand it. Like the taste
or the deliciousness...

323816.「そっか……ラキは ごはん食べないし\n 味覚とか わかんなくて トーゼンなのか:
I see...Raki doesn't eat rice, so maybe he
doesn't have a sense of taste and is just a
tozen.

323817.「でもさ ラキ。味は わからなくても\n 感じたことはあるんじゃない？\n おク:
But, Raki, even if you can't taste it, you
have felt it, haven't you? Like, "Oh mouth is
happy" or "I have a good feeling".

323819.「肉をかむと……汁が出てくる。\n あと……クチのまわりが ベトベトになる。:
When you bite into the meat... the juices come
out. Also... it gets sticky around the mouth.

323820.「逆に ザンシンな 食レポ……！:
On the contrary, it's a very nice food
report...!
